meanings.definition: Adwares: software that automatically displays or downloads advertising material when a user is online.
meanings.sent1: Some adwares can be quite annoying with all the pop-up ads they show.
meanings.sent2: I had to remove the adwares from my computer to stop the constant ads.
meanings.sent3: The adwares on my laptop seem to think I need to see ads every second!
meanings.sent4: The adwares invaded my screen like a swarm of digital salespeople.
meanings.sent5: The adwares turned my browsing experience into a never-ending ad marathon.
